summary: Jailed for murders he didn't commit, Randy escapes only to stumble into the den of the real murderers.
cast: John Wayne|Alberta Vaughn|George 'Gabby' Hayes|Yakima Canutt|Earl Dwire|Artie Ortego|Tex Phelps|Horace B. Carpenter|Tommy Coats|Herman Hack|Perry Murdock|Tex Palmer|Mack V. Wright
director: Director: Harry L. Fraser (as Harry Fraser)
title: Randy cabalga solo
